summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $50.00 out of the General Fund of the City of Seattle to pay the claim of L. C. Huntington for damage caused by the breaking of a sewer pipe which is located directly back of Lot 56, of the private plat of West Seattle Land & Improvement Company, on which a dwelling and certain personal property of L. C. Huntington, is located, the hour of 1:00 o'clock P.M., and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
